main event: An unidentified radar target was observed moving at high speed near Miami, Florida, on February 14, 1962.
interesting points: The radar target moved erratically and made sharp turns,The object appeared to change shape,The sighting was consistent with previous reports from the area,The witness was at a hotel pool and observed a bright light moving across the sky which dimmed as it approached the moon,Four witnesses including the observer saw the bright light but it did not reappear after passing near the moon.
sighted object: unidentified radar target and a bright light in the sky
witness description: witnesses were sitting by the swimming pool at the Key Biscayne Hotel
